Content:: One-day races and Classics Maciej Bodnar (born 7 March 1985, in Oława)[5] is a Polish professional road racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI ProTeam Team TotalEnergies.[6] He is the brother of fellow racing cyclist Łukasz Bodnar.[7] Bodnar has been a team-mate of Peter Sagan throughout Sagan's career.
